itunes:title: #134: Lessons Learned from Divorcing
title: #134: Lessons Learned from Divorcing
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Making the right decision for yourself is hard, and it can make you go through a lot of back and forth.  In today's episode, I talk about some lessons I learned during this process.   RESOURCES MENTIONED  Join our weekly text inspiration...
itunes:summary:
Making the right decision for yourself is hard, and it can make you go through a lot of back and forth. 

In today's episode, I talk about some lessons I learned during this process.

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
